snippet.title: Glitch's Trip: Space Rave Trailer
snippet.description:
Space Rave:
• A Vibrant environment where you'll have to master Gravity to survive.
• 25 New Levels with Challenge Variants.
• 4 New Achievements Specifically for Space Rave.
• A new DJing Boss.

Additional Features:
• Controller Adjustments and Balance Changes
• Steam Trading Cards and Workshop
• Improved Level Editor
• New Sound Effects
• And of course more Bug Fixes!

This new update has been a long time coming. Thanks so much for your patience. If you want quick answers to questions we just started a discord channel where you'll be able to contact us directly. You can join it here: https://discord.gg/ShenUFA
